column4: killerbeesateme-> you can not get to the internet?  what kind of connectivity do you have?
killerbeesateme-> that only removes entries from the init.d so remove entries there
I'm actually on the system now.  Everything runs fine, unless i do anything upgrade/install wise with apt, then the system hangs
I can't install or upgrade any packages.  I normally wouldn't mind, but doing a reset via the button to install packages is not the greatest way to go
